reviewText: Hosted by Al Michaels, this video covers the top 10 sports moments of the 80s, with memorable plays and tributes mixed in. No. 1 is of course, The Miracle on Ice, called by Michaels. Flutie's 1984 Hail Mary, 1982 Stanford-Cal " the Band is Still on the Field!" play, Game 6 of the '86 World Series are some of the great moments. Strangely, the NBA is not featured.
